actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from tax any gain on the sale or exchange of property acquired from the Resolution Trust Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from tax any gain on the sale or exchange of property which is a capital asset or property used in the trade or business and which was acquired from the Resolution Trust Corporation.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from tax any gain on the sale or exchange of property acquired from the Resolution Trust Corporation.
